Package org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base.core

Class ErsapComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.epsci.ersap.base.core.ErsapComponent
  • public final class ErsapComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    ERSAP component. This is used to define service, container, DPE and orchestrator components.

    • Method Detail

      • orchestrator

        public static ErsapComponent orchestrator​(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                          int dpePort,
                                          java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                          int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP orchestrator.
        Parameters:
        name - of the orchestrator
        dpeHost - host of the PDE to communicate with
        dpePort - port of the DPE to communicate with
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the orchestrator to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of this orchestrator
        Returns:
        orchestrator ErsapComponent object

      • orchestrator

        public static ErsapComponent orchestrator​(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                          java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                          int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP orchestrator. Uses default DPE port.
        Parameters:
        name - of the orchestrator
        dpeHost - host of the PDE to communicate with
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the orchestrator to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of this orchestrator
        Returns:
        the orchestrator component

      • orchestrator

        public static ErsapComponent orchestrator​(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                          int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP orchestrator. Default port of the DP and Java lang is used.
        Parameters:
        name - of the orchestrator
        dpeHost - host of the PDE to communicate with
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the orchestrator to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of this orchestrator
        Returns:
        the orchestrator component

      • orchestrator

        public static ErsapComponent orchestrator​(java.lang.String name,
                                          int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                          java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP orchestrator. DPE on the local host, with the default port and Java lang is used.
        Parameters:
        name - of the orchestrator
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the orchestrator to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of this orchestrator
        Returns:
        the orchestrator component

      • dpe

        public static ErsapComponent dpe​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                 int dpePort,
                                 java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                 int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                 java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP DPE component.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host where the DPE will run
        dpePort - port of the DPE will use
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the DPE to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the DPE
        Returns:
        the DPE component

      • dpe

                                 java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                 int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                 java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP DPE component. The default DPE port is used.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host where the DPE will run
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the DPE to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the DPE
        Returns:
        the DPE component

      • dpe

        public static ErsapComponent dpe​(int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                 java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP DPE component. The local host, default DPE port and Java lang is used.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the DPE to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the DPE
        Returns:
        the DPE component

        Creates and returns ERSAP DPE component. DPE default settings are used

      • dpe

        public static ErsapComponent dpe​(java.lang.String canonicalName,
                                 java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP DPE component from the ERSAP component canonical name.. DPE default pool-size = 1 is used.
        Parameters:
        canonicalName - The canonical name of a component
        description - textual description of the DPE
        Returns:
        the DPE component

      • dpe

        public static ErsapComponent dpe​(java.lang.String canonicalName)
        Creates and returns ERSAP DPE component from the ERSAP component canonical name.. DPE default pool-size = 1 is used, leaving description of the DPE undefined.
        Parameters:
        canonicalName - The canonical name of a component
        Returns:
        the DPE component

      • container

        public static ErsapComponent container​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                       int dpePort,
                                       java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                       java.lang.String container,
                                       int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                       java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Container component.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host of the DPE where container is/(will be) deployed
        dpePort - port of the DPE where container is/(will be) deployed
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        container - the name of the container
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the container to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the container
        Returns:
        the container component

      • container

        public static ErsapComponent container​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                       java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                       java.lang.String container,
                                       int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                       java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Container component. The default DPE port is used.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host of the DPE where container is/(will be) deployed
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        container - the name of the container
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the container to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the container
        Returns:
        the container component

        public static ErsapComponent container​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                       java.lang.String container,
                                       int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                       java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Container component. The default DPE port and Java lang is used.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host of the DPE where container is/(will be) deployed
        container - the name of the container
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the container to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the container
        Returns:
        the container component

      • container

        public static ErsapComponent container​(java.lang.String container,
                                       int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                       java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Container component. The DPE running on a local host, default DPE port and Java lang is used.
        Parameters:
        container - the name of the container
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the container to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the container
        Returns:
        the container component

      • container

        public static ErsapComponent container​(java.lang.String containerCanonicalName,
                                       java.lang.String description)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Container component, using the container canonical name. Default subscriptions pool-size = 1 is used.
        Parameters:
        containerCanonicalName - the canonical name of the container
        description - textual description of the container
        Returns:
        the container component

      • container

        public static ErsapComponent container​(java.lang.String containerCanonicalName)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Container component, using the container canonical name. Default subscriptions pool-size = 1 is used.
        Parameters:
        containerCanonicalName - the canonical name of the container
        Returns:
        the container component

      • service

        public static ErsapComponent service​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                     int dpePort,
                                     java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                     java.lang.String container,
                                     java.lang.String engine,
                                     java.lang.String engineClass,
                                     int subscriptionPoolSize,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.String initialState)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Service component.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host of the DPE where service is/(will be) deployed
        dpePort - port of the DPE where service is/(will be) deployed
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        container - the name of the container of the service
        engine - the name of the service engine
        engineClass - engine full class name (package name)
        subscriptionPoolSize - pool size for the service to be used for subscriptions
        description - textual description of the service
        initialState - the initial state of the service
        Returns:
        the service component

      • service

        public static ErsapComponent service​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                     int dpePort,
                                     java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                     java.lang.String container,
                                     java.lang.String engine)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Service component. Default pool-size=1 is used. The description of the service is undefined.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host of the DPE where service is/(will be) deployed
        dpePort - port of the DPE where service is/(will be) deployed
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        container - the name of the container of the service
        engine - the name of the service engine
        Returns:
        the service component

      • service

        public static ErsapComponent service​(java.lang.String dpeHost,
                                     java.lang.String dpeLang,
                                     java.lang.String container,
                                     java.lang.String engine)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Service component. DPE default port and default pool-size=1 is used. The description of the service is undefined.
        Parameters:
        dpeHost - host of the DPE where service is/(will be) deployed
        dpeLang - language of the DPE
        container - the name of the container of the service
        engine - the name of the service engine
        Returns:
        the service component

      • service

        public static ErsapComponent service​(java.lang.String container,
                                     java.lang.String engine)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Service component. DPE running on a local host with the default port and default pool-size=1 is used. The description of the service is undefined.
        Parameters:
        container - the name of the container of the service
        engine - the name of the service engine
        Returns:
        the service component

      • service

        public static ErsapComponent service​(java.lang.String container,
                                     java.lang.String engine,
                                     int poolSize)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Service component. DPE running on a local host with the default port used. The description of the service is undefined.
        Parameters:
        container - the name of the container of the service
        engine - the name of the service engine
        poolSize - pool size for the service subscriptions
        Returns:
        the service component

      • service

        public static ErsapComponent service​(java.lang.String serviceCanonicalName)
        Creates and returns ERSAP Service component, using the service canonical name. Default subscriptions pool-size = 1 is used. The description of the service is undefined.
        Parameters:
        serviceCanonicalName - canonical name of the service
        Returns:
        the service component

      • getTopic

        public org.jlab.coda.xmsg.core.xMsgTopic getTopic()
        Returns the topic of the ERSAP component, i.e. the topic of the xMsg subscriber. Note that all ERSAP components are registered as xMsg subscribers.
        Returns:
        xMsgTopic object

      • getCanonicalName

        public java.lang.String getCanonicalName()

      • setCanonicalName

        public void setCanonicalName​(java.lang.String canonicalName)
        Note. candidate to be deprecated. Do not use to define the canonical names for DPE, container or service. The canonical name of a ERSAP component is defined internally, yet this method is used to set the name of an orchestrator, which considers to be non critical.
        Parameters:
        canonicalName - canonical name
